title: Station in life
creator_credit: Television New Zealand, Frank Torley and John Gordon
brief_description: Shows some of the daily activities on a sheep property in the New Zealand high country. Notes the effect of the climate on the husbandry practices at this station and the changes in land use due to soil erosion.
